title: vENu gAna lOluniga
sahitya:
vENugAna lOluni ganaveyi kannulu gAvalenE

anupallavi

 (ali)vEnu lella drSTi cuTTi vEyucu mrokkucu rAka

caraNam

 vikasita pankaja vadanalu vividha gatula nADaga nokari nokari kokaru 
karamuna niDi yOra kanula jUDaga shuka rambulu gala taruNulu 
sogasugAnu pADaga sakala surulu tyAgarAja sakhuni vEDaga vaccu
